(Simplified: 屦)
Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 婁 indicates the sound; 彳 (step) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿸ Surround from upper left
    • 尸 [ shī ] body, corpse
    • ⿰ Left to right
      • 彳 [ chì ] to step with the left foot
      • 婁 [ lóu ] a constellation; to wear; surname
①古代用麻葛製成的一種鞋：屨賤踊貴(鞋價低賤而假肢卻很貴，形容社會黑暗，統治者慘無人道，濫施酷刑)。
②踐踏。
③古同“屢”，接連着。
(Simplified: 屦)

屨字的基本解释

屨
jù
见“屦”。

屨字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jù］
［《廣韻》九遇切，去遇，見。］
“屦1”的繁体字。
(1)单底鞋。多以麻、葛、皮等制成。后亦泛指鞋。
(2)穿鞋。
(3)脚上着物。参见“屨校”。
(4)踩踏。
(5)任，担任。

屨字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【尸字部】　屨； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页304第01
【唐韻】九遇切【集韻】【韻會】俱遇切【正韻】居御切，?音句。【說文】履也。从履省，婁聲。又鞮也。【徐曰】鞮，革履也。【釋名】屨，拘也，所以拘足也。【周禮·天官】屨人掌王及后之服屨。【註】複下曰舄，禪下曰屨。【疏】複下謂重底，禪下謂禪底也。【儀禮·士喪禮】夏葛屨，冬白屨。【禮·曲禮】侍坐於長者，屨不上於堂。　又【增韻】同鞻。【周禮】有鞮鞻氏。

考證：〔【儀禮·士冠禮】夏葛屨，冬皮屨。〕　謹按士冠禮無此文，查係士喪禮云夏葛屨，冬白屨。謹將冠改喪。皮改白。

Basic explanation of words
sandals

sandals
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jù］
["Guangyun" nine encounters cut, go to meet, see. ]
Traditional characters for "屦1".
(1) Single-soled shoes. It is mostly made of hemp, kudzu, peel, etc. Later also refers to shoes.
(2) Wear shoes.
(3) Things on the feet. See "屦校".
(4) Stepping on.
(5) Ren, serve.
sandals
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Yin Ji 1] [Department of Corpse Characters] 　屦; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 304 No. 01
[Tang Yun] Nine Yuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] All Yuqie [Zhengyun] Juyu cut,? Syllable. [Said the text] Li also. From the province, Lou Sheng. It's also great. [Xu Yue] Mo, leather shoes. 【Release Name】Yu, you are restrained, so you are restrained. 【Zhou Li·Tianguan】The prince and the queen's service. [Note] Fuxia is called 舄, and Zen is called 屦. 【Sparse】Combination refers to the heavy bottom, and Zen refers to the bottom of Zen. [Rituals and Funerals] Xia Ge 屦, Dong Bai 屦. 【Li·Chu Li】Serve the elders and cannot go to the hall.　[Zeng Yun] the same as Ding. [Zhou Li] There is the Dianji clan. Textual research: [[Ritual Ceremony·Shiguan Ceremony] Xia Geqi, Dongpiqi. 〔〕 　 There is no such article in the ceremony of Shiguan. The funeral of the scholars is Yunxia Geqi, and Dongbaiqi. I would like to change the crown to the funeral. Change the skin to white.
